chat_label: World 10k Elite - What is the minimum age to apply to Marathon?
chat_desc: Minimum age to apply to the marathon as on born on or before 18.05.2001 is 18 years.

chat_label: World 10k Elite - When is the registration starting?
chat_desc: The registration starting soon. Stay connected. We will be updating soon. For more information, click [here, https://tcsworld10k.procam.in/race-categories/world-10k-run/information/info, _blank].

chat_label: World 10k Elite - When are the application start date?
chat_desc: The application start date is usually 15-20 days before the race day. Stay connected. We will be updating soon. For more information, click [here, https://tcsworld10k.procam.in/race-categories/world-10k-run/information/info, _blank].

chat_label: World 10k Elite - Where can I get my Bib Number?

For more information, Click [here, https://tcsworld10k.procam.in/runners-information/collection-of-bibs, _blank].
